note: VALIDATED: Proof correctly establishes UI of {exp(Psi_eps^ren(Phi_eps))} on fixed Skorokhod space (Omega,P) via Vitali criterion. Key steps verified: (1) law transfer E_P[Y_eps^{1+delta}] = E_{mu_eps}[exp((1+delta)Psi_eps^ren)] correct by Skorokhod construction; (2) Holder (4,4,4,4) correctly factors 4-term exponential; (3) each factor bounded uniformly in eps by validated node 1.6.2.10.2.4. Crucially Psi_eps^ren excludes divergent L_eps and K_eps (1.5.1 validated). Two minor non-blocking challenges filed: (a) eps-dependent test functions (resolved by Young convolution ineq); (b) phi vs phi_eps in linear term (resolved by same BG method). Neither affects validity.
